User and Access Management API - a single API for the Single Sign On solution to manage users and user claims API documentation version 1

https://localhost:53677

/users

/users get post

get

Gets a specified number of users using paging

post

Creates a new user. Optionally claims may be supplied

get /users

Gets a specified number of users using paging

  • Request
  • Response

Query Parameters

  • PageStart: required (integer - minimum: 1 )

    The first item to retrieve

  • PageSize: required (integer - minimum: 1 - maximum: 100)

    The number of items to retrieve

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"items":[
		{								"id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64085",	
	"email": "example@example.com",				
				"forename": "...",
								"surname": "...",
								"location": "...",	
							"accountName": "companyName"							},
							{								"id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64086",							
	"email": "test@test.com",
								"forename": "...",
								"surname": "...",								
"location": "...",
								"accountName": "otherCompany"							
}							],
						"paging": [
"currentPage": 1,
"pageSize": 25,
"itemsOnPage": 10,
"totalPages":2,
"totalItems":18
]}

HTTP status code 400

There was a problem with the requested parameters

post /users

Creates a new user. Optionally claims may be supplied

  • Response

HTTP status code 201

New user created successfully

Headers

  • location: required (string )

    Absolute uri of the created user

    Example:

    <<baseUri>>/users/{userId}

HTTP status code 400

HTTP status code 422

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There were validation errors with the supplied data",
"errorContent": [
{
"fieldName": "email",
"message": "supplied value was not a valid email address"
}
]}

HTTP status code 500

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "The user could not be created"
}

/users/{userId} get put

get

Gets a specific user using their unique Id and their claims

put

Updates a user with the values supplied

get /users/{userId}

Gets a specific user using their unique Id and their claims

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string )

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64085",								
"email": "example@example.com",								
"forename": "...",
								"surname": "...",								
"location": "...",								
"accountName": "bigCompany",								
"claims": [{											
  "id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64087",
  "type": "forename",
											  "value": "john"										  },
										  {											
  "id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64088",
  "type": "surname",											
  "value": "smith"										  
  }]
}

HTTP status code 404

No user was found matching the supplied Id

put /users/{userId}

Updates a user with the values supplied

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64094"
}

HTTP status code 204

The user was successfully updated

HTTP status code 400

HTTP status code 422

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There were validation errors with the supplied data",
"errorContent": [
{
"fieldName": "email",
"message": "supplied value was not a valid email address"
}
]}

HTTP status code 500

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "The user could not be updated"
}

/users/{userId}/authenticate post

post

Authenticates the user

post /users/{userId}/authenticate

Authenticates the user

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
							"email": "...",
							"password": "..."
						}

HTTP status code 200

User is authenticated

HTTP status code 400

User is not authenticated

HTTP status code 422

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There were validation errors with the supplied data",
"errorContent": [
{
"fieldName": "email",
"message": "supplied value was not a valid email address"
}
]}

HTTP status code 500

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There was a problem authenticating the user"
}

/users/{userId}/deactivate post

post

Marks a user as deleted. They can no longer sign-in.

post /users/{userId}/deactivate

Marks a user as deleted. They can no longer sign-in.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string )

HTTP status code 204

The user has been successfully deactivated

HTTP status code 404

The user was not found

HTTP status code 500

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There was a problem deactivating the user"
}

/users/{userId}/restore post

post

Restores a deleted user.

post /users/{userId}/restore

Restores a deleted user.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string )

HTTP status code 200

The user has been successfully restored

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64089"
}

HTTP status code 404

The user could not be found

HTTP status code 500

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There was a problem restoring the user"
}

/users/{userId}/claims get post put delete

get

Gets the user's claims

post

Adds a new claim to the user

put

Updates the claims of a specified type for a user.

delete

Removes all claims of a specified type.

get /users/{userId}/claims

Gets the user's claims

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string )

Query Parameters

  • ClaimTypes: (string )

    Comma separated list of claim types to filter the claims by

HTTP status code 200

Claims for a specific user

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "claims": [
  {
  "id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64090",
									  "type": "forename",									
  "value": "john"								
  },								
  {									
  "id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64091",
  "type": "surname",
  		"value": "smith"								}],
  								"total": 5
}

HTTP status code 400

HTTP status code 404

The user could not be found

HTTP status code 500

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There was a problem retrieving the claims"
}

post /users/{userId}/claims

Adds a new claim to the user

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string )

HTTP status code 201

The claim was successfully added to the user.

Headers

  • location: required (string )

    Relative URL of the created claim

    Example:

    /users/{userId}/claims/{claimId}

HTTP status code 404

The requested user could not be found

HTTP status code 422

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There were validation errors with the supplied data",
"errorContent": [
{
"fieldName": "value",
"message": "supplied value was not valid"
}
]}

HTTP status code 500

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There was a problem adding the claim"
}

put /users/{userId}/claims

Updates the claims of a specified type for a user.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string )

Query Parameters

  • ClaimTypes: required (string )

    The claim type to update

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64093"
}

HTTP status code 200

The claims have been successfully updated.

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"claims": [{
  									"id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64091",
  "type": "forename",
  		"value": "john"								
  								},								
  {
 "id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64091",
  "type": "surname",
  		"value": "smith"								
  								}],								
  "total": 2
}

HTTP status code 400

HTTP status code 404

HTTP status code 422

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There were validation errors with the supplied data",
"errorContent": [
{
"fieldName": "type",
"message": "supplied value was not valid"
}
]}

HTTP status code 500

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There was a problem updating the claim"
}

delete /users/{userId}/claims

Removes all claims of a specified type.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string )

Query Parameters

  • ClaimTypes: required (string )

    The claim type to update

HTTP status code 204

The claim(s) have been successfully removed

HTTP status code 500

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There was a problem deleting the claim"
}

/users/{userId}/claims/{claim} get put delete

get

Get a specific claim using the unique id

put

Update the value of this claim. The id is provided in the body

delete

Remove the specific claim using the unique id

get /users/{userId}/claims/{claim}

Get a specific claim using the unique id

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string )
  • claim: required (string )

HTTP status code 200

The requested claim

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64091",
"type": "surname",
		"value": "smith"								
}

HTTP status code 404

The claim was not found

HTTP status code 500

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There was a retrieving updating the claim"
}

put /users/{userId}/claims/{claim}

Update the value of this claim. The id is provided in the body

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string )
  • claim: required (string )

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64092"
}

HTTP status code 200

The claims have been successfully updated.

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"id": "8bf84292-2ba7-4605-a77c-054a55b64091",
"type": "surname",
		"value": "smith"								
}

HTTP status code 400

HTTP status code 404

HTTP status code 422

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There were validation errors with the supplied data",
"errorContent": [
{
"fieldName": "type",
"message": "supplied value was not valid"
}
]}

HTTP status code 500

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There was a problem updating the claim"
}

delete /users/{userId}/claims/{claim}

Remove the specific claim using the unique id

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string )
  • claim: required (string )

HTTP status code 204

The claim was successfully deleted

HTTP status code 404

The claim was not found

HTTP status code 500

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"errorMessage": "There was a problem deleting the claim"
}
  • /users
